item.title: The Mead From Hell
item.description: What if I handmade Christmas gifts this year? The oft-discussed “five love languages” concept includes gift giving as a language of love. In middle school I remember we had to rank our love languages from most preferred to least preferred, and if I remember right, gift giving came out last. To this day, I’m not the biggeset fan of giving or receiving gifts. Maybe I am a scrooge, a meiser, or an ahedonic post-capitalist (depending who you ask), but I view myself as preferring practicality over everything.
